definition: beyond the topmost clouds (idiom)/unimaginably far away
nine/9
firmament/heaven
cloud/CL:朵[duo3]
(classical) to say
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
outside/in addition/foreign/external

sentences.english: She is a casual woman who often throws sorrows far away.
sentences.chinese: 她是个大大咧咧的女人，总是把忧愁抛至九霄云外。

sentences.english: Will let like in making the new future, all will throw outside sadly beyond the highest heavens.
sentences.chinese: 让爱就在打造新的未来，一切忧伤抛九霄云外。

sentences.english: The old man thought that too many people now let good manners go by the board.
sentences.chinese: 这位老人认为，现在人把好的举止抛到九霄云外去了。

sentences.english: Point is, I should be walking on clouds.
sentences.chinese: 重点是，我本应乐到九霄云外。

sentences.english: History was thrown out and dignity and worth went with it.
sentences.chinese: 历史被抛到了九霄云外，尊严和价值也随之而去。

sentences.english: She 's a careless woman, always tends to throw worries far far away.
sentences.chinese: 她是个大大咧咧的女人，总是把忧愁抛至九霄云外。

sentences.english: Worldly all complicated, was cast to be flung to the four winds.
sentences.chinese: 尘世间的一切繁杂，都被抛到了九霄云外。

sentences.english: What's certain is that 2007 seems far away.
sentences.chinese: 唯一可以确定的是，2007年似乎已在九霄云外。

definition: the back of the head/(fig.) the back of one's mind
to vanish like smoke in thin air/to disappear
to clear off/to make a clean sweep of
to sweep clean/to clean out
to cast or put aside/to forget for a while
thoroughly (idiom)/completely/one and all/very clean
variant of 一股腦兒|一股脑儿[yi1 gu3 nao3 r5]
erhua variant of 一股腦|一股脑[yi1 gu3 nao3]
to get carried away/to forget oneself
the clouds melt and the mists disperse (idiom)/to clear up/to vanish into thin air
distracting thoughts
wishing one could do sth/to hate to be unable/itching to do sth
completely/absolutely/undivided/totally mixed up/muddled
extreme point/pole/the origin (in polar coordinates)
in the extreme (idiom)/incapable of further increase
see 恨不得[hen4 bu5 de5]
